name: SantaFinder
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa finder
des: Santa Finder will update you with what activity Santa Claus is doing every day in December until Christmas Eve. On Christmas Eve, Santa Finder will tell you where Santa Claus is in the world delivering presents. Find out where he is at and if he is close by. Simply ask Santa Finder where is Santa?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
